tweets.author: オリコンニュース
tweets.text:
SUPER EIGHT Yū Yokoyama Suffers Injury Requiring 2 Months to Heal
Fractured Right Rib, Lumbar Spine Sprain in "Prank GP"
https://oricon.co.jp/news/2424632/full/?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=social&ref_cd=jstw003…

On the afternoon of 12/11 (Thu), during filming for Fuji TV's "Prank GP" show, it happened while recording a game where he was on a

thread_replies.author: キャン.
thread_replies.text: Pranks that injure talents should really be stopped already  I just can't understand what's funny about them (like wake-up pranks are fine)

thread_replies.author: しら
thread_replies.text: Fuji TV, at this point, it's just kinda amazing, isn't it? I almost want the network's very existence to be some kind of prank.

thread_replies.author: Bobとニャンコ
thread_replies.text: I'm worried that a lumbar sprain might turn into a hernia later on.

thread_replies.author: ゆっきぃ。
thread_replies.text: I really want you to be careful with work stuff 　Safety first, please make it a fun show 　Yokoyama-kun, I pray you get better soon

thread_replies.author: ねふぇる
thread_replies.text: My husband has taken on all sorts of unpleasant jobs before because they're part of the work (like being sent into bat caves or forced to inhale cow burps), but he's not a young guy anymore... Fuji TV... unforgivable...

thread_replies.author: mochico
thread_replies.text:
I was just feeling all warm and fuzzy watching Yokoyama-kun from Onigiri House when this news totally blew my mind   
Time Machine 3-gō Yamamoto-san also broke a bone on this show! Oh man, why do these things keep happening?  
Can't watch Prank GP without worrying  
#横山裕

thread_replies.author: 村井 正彦
thread_replies.text:
フジテレビは1993年6月「ウッチャンナンチャンの やるならやらねば!」 の収録中、ゲストの香港のロックバンドBEYONDのウォン・カークイがセットから足を滑らせて転落して死亡した事故を起こしているのに忘れたのか？
この事故では内村さんも転落して、全治2週間の打撲傷を負ったんだけど...。

thread_replies.author: minimum
thread_replies.text:
Fuji TV, don't you have a lot of injured people?  
Stop pulling pranks on people in their 40s. It affects their real jobs, you know

thread_replies.author: licha
thread_replies.text:
回転台に回る罰ゲーム、前に末澤誠也が乗った時も足が回っていて危ないと思った。
もう、下半身をスースーさせたり、下半身を露出させるドッキリは、いらない。

thread_replies.author: yurino
thread_replies.text: Yoko is too kind, so even if he gets seriously injured, he seems like he'd apologize to the staff saying it's his own fault and he's sorry, which makes me anxious.

thread_replies.author: みーすー
thread_replies.text:
My friend from Fukuoka sent me Subaru-kun   
He vividly remembers the location shoot from 9 years ago, and since it was so fun, he wants to call Ryusei Maruyama back again  
He also talked about his chats with Yuzo Hyakuyama-san  
And about the real, unfiltered Shibuya Subaru

thread_replies.author: くっくり@六四天安門事件
thread_replies.text:
I need some healing time right now. That 1164

Previously, at the temple where Mr. Leiji Matsumoto's words were displayed,
this time, words by Yuzuru Yokoyama from SUPER EIGHT were displayed.

Indeed, laughter is the best!
Let's activate NK cells and boost our immunity! \(^_^)/

thread_replies.author: Pragya
thread_replies.text:
Isn't Yokoyama-kun, among active idols...?

thread_replies.text: アルバムとツアーの告知だったんですけど、すばるくんが丸ちゃんとの福岡での思い出を楽しかったって言って今でもずっと覚えててなんかいいなあって思いました（寒いなかのロケとは言ってましたw）

thread_replies.author: ゆり@J事務所
thread_replies.text: While there are parts that can't be helped since it was an accident during filming, it hurts to think that Yokoyama-san is probably the one who's most frustrated about it ending up shelved, even though it was the first time we got invited to Doki Doki GP.

thread_replies.author: 眠
thread_replies.text: Takahiro Maruyama (42) is too adorably sad about saying goodbye to a member he's been with for 20 years

thread_replies.author: らあゆ
thread_replies.text:
Murakami Nobu's lecture was seriously so much fun, and above all, his style was insanely on point and he looked so cool.

I was like, yeah, he's an idol after all, and I was genuinely moved, plus his talking skills are amazing too, and the 90 minutes flew by in an instant.

thread_replies.author: あちゃん
thread_replies.text:
Oh man, oh man  
The Cowcon stream, honestly, I was like "It's cheaper than I thought!"  
But then I saw stuff like  
"It's not a free stream"  
"I'd rather have the TV broadcast"  
And I'm shocked  

If you worked and didn't get paid, you'd be mad, right?  
The talents and staff

thread_replies.author: みずき
thread_replies.text:
Forcing unsolicited opinions on marriage or  
causing broken bones—what the hell is this, Fuji TV...?  
If you're going to make a show, please make one that's fun for both the performers and the viewers...  
Hoping that Yokoyama-kun's injury heals completely without issue.

thread_replies.author: akiyoshiSUPEREIGHTER
thread_replies.text:
Just so sad   
It's heartbreaking that Yokoyama-kun, who has been working so hard all year long, tirelessly giving his all, has to endure pain while feeling sorry for others.  

Yokoyama-kun, please don't apologize. Take a good rest and take care of yourself.  
Don't

でも…横山くんに素晴らしいな写真を撮って貰ってですねぇ
#太一さん　#松兄
#関ジャニ∞ 　#横山くん
#タキシードの姿

thread_replies.author: みき  5人組が好き
thread_replies.text: その横山くん、今ネプリーグでおうおう言ってますよ〜

thread_replies.author: ぶどうパン
thread_replies.text:
ビシッとタキシード
なるほど！DASHデミー賞ですか
なんで微妙な顔になっちゃったんでしょう(笑)

thread_replies.author: ぴー。
thread_replies.text:
横山くんが撮ってくれたんですね
お二人ともかっこいいですよ
どことなくお顔が優しい感じなのは
カメラマンが横山くんだからですかね
TOKIOと関ジャニ∞大好きです

thread_replies.author: 田中咲子
thread_replies.text: 松岡君も、太一くんも、カッコイイいつまでも、応援してます。早く音楽番組で、TOKIOが、みたい

thread_replies.author: ぱんだこぱんだ
thread_replies.text: 2人のツーショット嬉しいです！！！！！！！横山くんGJ！！！！！！！！！！

thread_replies.author: ぱむちゃん (旧ばむちゃん)
thread_replies.text: 素敵です！！！ 年末に向けて正装増えて来るのかしら＼(^-^)／

tweets.author: みずき
tweets.text:
Forcing unsolicited opinions on marriage or  
causing broken bones—what the hell is this, Fuji TV...?  
If you're going to make a show, please make one that's fun for both the performers and the viewers...  
Hoping that Yokoyama-kun's injury heals completely without issue.

thread_replies.author: 紫月
thread_replies.text: So, there was a bone fracture accident on the same program in the past, huh? At that time, they also commented, "Regarding safety measures for future program production, we will continue to implement them even more thoroughly," but it's happened again, right? What the heck is

thread_replies.author: らあゆ
thread_replies.text:
Murakami Nobu's lecture was seriously so much fun, and above all, his style was insanely on point and he looked so cool.

I was like, yeah, he's an idol after all, and I was genuinely moved, plus his talking skills are amazing too, and the 90 minutes flew by in an instant.

thread_replies.author: ハル
thread_replies.text:
In this case, depending on the situation, it might have a tremendous impact on the filming of the drama after the New Year, right...?
Moreover, since it's Doki Doki GP, could it be a pattern where a surprise prank is suddenly set up and it leads straight to a serious injury...?

thread_replies.author: ゆり@J事務所
thread_replies.text: While there are parts that can't be helped since it was an accident during filming, it hurts to think that Yokoyama-san is probably the one who's most frustrated about it ending up shelved, even though it was the first time we got invited to Doki Doki GP.

tweets.author: akiyoshiSUPEREIGHTER
tweets.text:
Just so sad   
It's heartbreaking that Yokoyama-kun, who has been working so hard all year long, tirelessly giving his all, has to endure pain while feeling sorry for others.  

Yokoyama-kun, please don't apologize. Take a good rest and take care of yourself.  
Don't

tweets.author: Singapore EDB
tweets.text: Unlock Asia's green growth opportunities and drive decarbonisation strategies from SG.

tweets.author: きゃなみぃ♡
tweets.text: 横山くん大丈夫ですか

tweets.author: aya
tweets.text:
I don't want to watch that show anymore!
I didn't like it from the beginning, and even though I watched it when all the Tam members appeared, honestly, I regretted it because I didn't want to see the content...
This time, I absolutely can't forgive it!
How could you do something

tweets.author: モデルプレス
tweets.text:
Time Machine No. 3's Yamamoto Fractures Rib on Fuji TV's "Prank GP"

Article details here
https://mdpr.jp/news/4419436

The program's official website reported, "During the filming of our program on November 5 (Tuesday), Time Machine No. 3 member Koji Yamamoto suffered an injury in which he broke his rib."

#ドッキリGP #山本浩司 #タイムマシーン3号
